name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Express.js**, and **NestJS** for developing high-performance applications in diverse industries, including healthcare and finance. Proficient in designing and implementing robust **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL** services, as well as utilizing databases like **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**. Proven expertise in full-stack development with frameworks such as **React** and modern cloud solutions in **AWS** and **Azure**. 

Demonstrated experience in DevOps practices, integrating CI/CD pipelines for streamlined application delivery and maintenance. Adept at implementing advanced technologies, including **GenAI** for enhancing application intelligence. I have successfully led enterprise-grade projects that meet compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, while also focusing on secure coding practices. My passion for innovation drives my ability to create scalable solutions that optimize end-user experiences.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and maintained **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL** services while utilizing **TypeScript** and **Python** for scalable system architecture.
• Engineered high-performance web applications using **React** and efficient backend systems with **Express.js** and **NestJS**, achieving a **40%** improvement in load times.
• Designed and optimized data storage solutions leveraging **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**, leading to **25%** faster data retrieval and handling of large datasets.
• Implemented robust **DevOps** practices to streamline CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, reducing deployment times by **30%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions and integrate **GenAI** features into applications, enhancing user experience and engagement.
• Built and maintained high-quality documentation around APIs, ensuring clarity and ease of use for future development teams.
• Conducted peer reviews and fostered a culture of continuous improvement through shared coding standards and best practices, leading to a **20%** reduction in bugs post-deployment.
• Participated in agile sprint planning and retrospectives, contributing to the overall improvement and efficiency of development cycles.
• Engaged in troubleshooting and resolving complex technical issues in a timely manner, ensuring minimal disruption to user experience.
• Mentored junior developers, providing guidance on coding standards and technology stack adaptation including **React**, **TypeScript**, and backend technologies.

• Developed and implemented robust **RESTful API** and **GraphQL** services with **Node.js** (**NestJS/Express**) and **Python** to enhance system scalability and performance by **30%**.
• Built dynamic, user-focused front-end applications utilizing **React** (v18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, leveraging **TypeScript** and rapid UI frameworks like **Tailwind CSS** to ensure responsive designs for financial platforms, boosting user engagement by **25%**.
• Designed and developed complex data models in **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL** for efficient storage and retrieval of transactional data, enhancing data processing speed by **15%**.
• Integrated real-time data processing with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to facilitate event-driven architecture, improving transaction response times and operational efficiency by **40%**.
• Architected and managed advanced ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from multiple sources with **99.9%** data accuracy.
• Implemented advanced AI/ML-driven fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, enabling early identification of fraudulent activities effectively analyzing user behavior patterns.
• Developed predictive models for credit scoring and churn prediction utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating these models into backend services for real-time analytics, resulting in a **20%** reduction in false positives.

Utilized **TypeScript** and **Python** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability and scalability across key modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
Engineered robust APIs using **Express.js** and **NestJS** to deliver seamless interactions between frontend and backend services, enabling efficient data processing and response handling.
Developed and maintained applications using **React** (version **18**) to provide fast, responsive user experiences, leveraging state management with **Redux Toolkit**.
Implemented effective data management with **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring distributed data storage and rapid access to high-traffic e-commerce workflows with over **100,000** users.
Applied real-time data techniques including **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture, enhancing user engagement with features like dynamic inventory tracking and order status updates.
Created and optimized **RESTful APIs** and implemented **GraphQL** for streamlined data queries, reducing payload sizes and improving client load times by **30%**.
Contributed to DevOps practices by integrating CI/CD pipelines, facilitating automated builds and deployments which reduced deployment time by **50%**.
Implemented secure payment workflows with **Stripe**, handling tokenized transactions and ensuring PCI compliance for sensitive customer data.
Utilized role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** to secure user data, ensuring GDPR compliance and enhancing platform security across all user interactions.
Optimized UI for mobile-first designs using **Next.js** and **Vue 3 + Nuxt** to ensure accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1) and high search engine rankings.
